arch::iommu::registers::IommuRegisters::.doc: Reads the extended Capability of IOMMU

volatile::VolatileRef::<'a, T, A>::as_mu.doc:
Borrows this `VolatileRef` as a mutable [`VolatilePtr`].

 Use this method to do (partial) volatile reads or writes of the referenced data.

arch::iommu::registers::IommuRegisters::.doc:
Writes value to the global command register. This function will not wait until the command
 is serviced. User need to check the global status register.
Reads the global Status of IOMMU
